mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( title, vol, series_title, series_no, author, ea_isbn, ea_add_code, set_isbn, set_add_code, set_expression, publisher, edition_stmt, pre_price, kdc, ddc, page, book_size, form, publish_predate, subject, ebook_yn, cip_yn, control_no, title_url, book_tb_cnt_url, book_introduction_url, book_summary_url, publisher_url, input_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{VOL}, #{SERIES_TITLE}, #{SERIES_NO}, #{AUTHOR}, #{EA_ISBN}, #{EA_ADD_CODE}, #{SET_ISBN}, #{SET_ADD_CODE}, #{SET_EXPRESSION}, #{PUBLISHER}, #{EDITION_STMT}, #{PRE_PRICE}, #{KDC}, #{DDC}, #{PAGE}, #{BOOK_SIZE}, #{FORM}, #{PUBLISH_PREDATE}, #{SUBJECT}, #{EBOOK_YN}, #{CIP_YN}, #{CONTROL_NO}, #{TITLE_URL}, #{BOOK_TB_CNT_URL}, #{BOOK_INTRODUCTION_URL}, #{BOOK_SUMMARY_URL}, #{PUBLISHER_URL}, #{INPUT_DATE}, #{UPDATE_DATE} )
